current.supported_currencies: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
current.html:
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@500&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<style>
@font-face {
    font-family: 'passagerregular';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0604/1370/6468/files/passager-webfont.woff2?v=1634537259') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0604/1370/6468/files/passager-webfont.woff?v=1634537259') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;

}

/* logo list */
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad 
.section-header__title{
    font-family: 'passagerregular';
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size: 30px;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad {
    margin: 0;
    padding:60px 0 75px;
    background: #000000;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar{
 margin: 0;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad  .logo-bar__item{
    position: relative;
    width: 20%;
    flex: unset;
    padding: 0px 30px;
    margin: 0; 
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad  .logo-bar__item .logo_img{
        max-width: 120px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    min-height: 125px;
    display: -webkit-box; 
display: -moz-box;
display: -ms-flexbox;
display: -webkit-flex; 
display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}

#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad  .logo-bar__item:after{
content: "";
    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0604/1370/6468/files/logo_arrow.png?v=1634551042);
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
   width: 30px;
    height: 40px;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    right: -15px;
 transform: translateY(-50%);
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar .logo-bar__item:last-child:after{
    display: none;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item .logo_text{
        margin-top: 10px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item p{
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 500;
    margin: 0;
}

@media (max-width: 959px) {
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad {
    padding: 25px 0 35px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad 
.section-header__title{
    font-size: 26px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item p{
    font-size: 12px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item .logo_img{
    max-width: 100px;
}
}

@media (max-width: 600px){
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .section-header{
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item{
    padding: 0px 6px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item .logo_img {
    max-width: 50px;
    min-height: 55px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item p {
    font-size: 10px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item:after{
width: 12px;
    height: 15px;
    right: -10px;
}

}

/* Testimonials */
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc{
    background-image: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0604/1370/6468/files/review_back.jpg?v=1634540117);
    background-size: cover;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 50px 0;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc .testimonials-wrapper{
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc 
 .testimonials-slider__text cite {
    font-style: italic;
    font-size: 15px;
    color: #939393;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc
.testimonials-slider__text{
    background: #000000;
    padding: 50px 30px;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc .slick-track .slick-slide:nth-child(3n + 1)
.testimonials-slider__text{
border: 4px solid #ff5cc9;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc .slick-track .slick-slide:nth-child(3n + 2)
.testimonials-slider__text{
border: 4px solid #6ec7ff;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc .slick-track .slick-slide:nth-child(3n + 3)
.testimonials-slider__text{
border: 4px solid #d3ff29;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc
.testimonials-slider {
    margin-bottom: 0px;
}
@media(max-width: 1200px){
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc .testimonials-slider__text{
    padding: 30px 15px;
}
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {

#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc{
    padding: 25px 0;
}
#shopify-section-1634533818311f83bc .testimonials-slider__text cite{
font-size: 13px;
}
}

/* Instagram */
#shopify-section-1634534145cbaa40f0{
background: #9c82e6;
}
#shopify-section-1634534145cbaa40f0
.custom-content{
    margin: 0px;
}
#shopify-section-1634534145cbaa40f0
.custom-content .custom__item{
    padding-left: 0px;
    margin: 0;
}
#shopify-section-1634534145cbaa40f0
.custom__item-inner{
    display: block;
}
#shopify-section-1634534145cbaa40f0
.custom-content
.insta_title{
font-family: 'passagerregular';
 font-weight: normal;
color: #000000;
text-align: center;
font-size: 24px;
letter-spacing: 2px;
margin-top: 25px;
}

@media (max-width: 1200px){
#shopify-section-1634534817b324c0ad .logo-bar__item{
    width: 25%;
}
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
#shopify-section-1634534145cbaa40f0
.custom-content
.insta_title{
font-size: 22px;
}
}
</style>
current.checkout_heading_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
current.checkout_body_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'

settings.title: Versatile SIGNZ
settings.content:
Versatile Signz is a black-owned custom neon light and rug service provider. We are known for quality signs and rugs at affordable prices. Established in 2021, we were inspired to create a company that put a smile on people's faces through our custom creations. Here at Versatile Signz we love to help our customers bring their vision to life.


When it comes to customizing rugs and neon signs, we are the number one choice. We have created products for dozens of celebrities and have become a well-known brand throughout the industry.  Versatile Signz is here every step of the way to create your perfect sign or rug. Count on our team to deliver a sensational ordering experience. Our versatility and quick turnaround time is unmatched.

settings.title: Why Versatile Signz?
settings.content: Versatile Signz goal is to create a platform where customers can express themselves through neon lights and rugs. We bring your vision to life as a custom service provider. Each customized piece is handcrafted with precision. We specialize in customizable products that tell your story and we don't look at our customers as consumers, you’re family and we take care of family!

settings.text: Versatile Signz is a small owned business known for quality signs and low prices. You can count on our team to deliver a sensational ordering experience. We guarantee superior service.

settings.title: How do you power the LED neon signs?
settings.answer: \All of our signs connect directly into a standard power socket (with a plug that’s specific to the country you’re shipping to) and a 12V transformer.

settings.title: What Colors Do You Offer?
settings.answer: Blue, Light Blue, Golden-Yellow, Yellow, Purple, Red, Cold-White, Warm-White, Orange, Green, Pink
